lead_paragraph: England prop Joe Marler has found himself in trouble again after being cited for foul play during Harlequins' 30-6 defeat of Grenoble in the European Challenge Cup semi-final.

headline.print_headline: England Duo Marler and Farrell Cited
headline.main: England Duo Marler and Farrell Cited

snippet: England prop Joe Marler has found himself in trouble again after being cited for foul play during Harlequins' 30-6 defeat of Grenoble in the European Challenge Cup semi-final....
